thread.title: Perfect stay
thread.title_full: Perfect stay - Review of Shangri-La's China World Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: drogenlee
title: Perfect stay
text:
China world hotel is a good choice.This time was our first time in here.and the decoration of the hotel is very beautiful. Color of flower in the lobby. The room is comfortable and clean,many restaurants in the mail,and the mail very near from the hotel.very convenience.
Room Tip: High floor ,quite room See more room tips
